Package render

Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • render.Shape2D
  • public class Shape2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A Shape2D represent a 2D shape made up of Points in 3D space.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shape2D​(java.util.ArrayList<Point> points)
      Creates a Shape2D with a default color of Color.WHITE.
      Shape2D​(java.util.ArrayList<Point> points, java.awt.Color color)
      Creates a Shape2D with a specific Color.
      Shape2D​(Point[] points)
      Creates a Shape2D with a default color of Color.WHITE.
      Shape2D​(Point[] points, java.awt.Color color)
      Creates a Shape2D with a specific Color.

      Returns the Shape2D after being translated by matrix m but dose not alter the original Shape2D.

      Returns the Shape2D after being translated but dose not alter the original Shape2D.

      • transform

        public void transform​(Matrix m)
        Transforms the shape by a transformation matrix.
        Parameters:

        Since:
        1.0

      • getTransformedShape

        public Shape2D getTransformedShape​(Point offset,
                                   double angleAboutX,
                                   double angleAboutY)
        Returns the Shape2D after being translated but dose not alter the original Shape2D.

        First it is transformed by the negative offset then rotated about the y and x axis.<\p>

        Parameters:
        offset - The amount the shape should be offset by.
        angleAboutY - The angle you want to rotate.
        angleAboutX - The amount the shape should be offset by.
        Returns:
        TShape2D after being translated.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getTransformedShape

        public Shape2D getTransformedShape​(Matrix m)
        Returns the Shape2D after being translated by matrix m but dose not alter the original Shape2D.
        Parameters:
        m - The matrix to transform the shape by.
        Returns:
        TShape2D after being translated.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getTransformedVertexes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Point> getTransformedVertexes​(Matrix m)
        Returns an ArrayList of the shapes vertexes after being transformed but does not perminantly transform the shape.
        Parameters:
        m - The transformation matrix to be applied to the shape.
        Returns:
        The translated vertexes of the shape.
        Since:
        1.0
